subSections.title: Readings
Affix
Derived terms
Noun
Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=원|eumhun=|mr=wŏn|y=wen}}

원 is equivalent to "hall" in English, a reference to a building, room, or suite of rooms with a particular purpose.
